title: Typeface ID - Help please!
content:
Hello All,

Can someone, anyone please help me identify the font of word “divorce” in the following logo? The letter ’c’ seems to be quite unique. I am already aware that the word “wealth” is in Garamond.

Thanks to all who can help! :)

A.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo-for-typophile.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194915/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo-for-typophile.png) | 7.79 KB |

 [‹ Could someone id this very cool typo? thanks](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194915/http:/typophile.com/node/50117 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font ID: Swiss poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006194915/http:/typophile.com/node/50120 "Go to next forum topic")
author: a.l.i.c.i.a.

comments.content: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
